text: Paul Franklin Crouch (March 30, 1934 - November 30, 2013) was an American Christian broadcaster. Crouch, along with his wife Jan, and televangelist Jim Bakker and Tammy Faye Bakker, founded the Trinity Broadcasting Network in 1973 (TBN) along with his wife Jan Crouch. Crouch was born in St. Joseph, Missouri. Crouch died in Orange, California from heart disease, aged 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1934 births Category:2013 deaths Category:American Pentecostals Category:People from St. Joseph, Missouri Category:Television evangelists Category:Writers from Missouri
title: Paul Crouch
